function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Close contact settings increase the risk of COVID-19 transmission","Impact":"Increased risk of coronavirus transmission","Mitigation":"Adopting social distancing and installation of barriers to reduce close contact","Technologies":"Barriers, physical distancing markers, and ventilation systems","People":"People in crowded and close-contact settings","Owner":"Building owners, managers, and public health authorities"},{"Description":"Poorly ventilated indoor areas increase the risk of COVID-19 transmission","Impact":"Higher likelihood of virus spread in enclosed spaces","Mitigation":"Upgrade ventilation systems, use air purifiers, and promote outdoor activities","Technologies":"Mechanical ventilation, air purifiers, and natural ventilation systems","People":"Individuals in indoor spaces with inadequate ventilation","Owner":"Building owners, facility managers, and public health organizations"},{"Description":"Activities with increased particle emission raise the risk of COVID-19 transmission","Impact":"Elevated risk of virus transmission during activities such as singing or heavy breathing","Mitigation":"Avoiding crowded and enclosed spaces, using masks, and improving ventilation","Technologies":"Masks, increased outdoor airflow, and improved indoor ventilation systems","People":"Individuals participating in high-emission activities","Owner":"Event organizers, public health authorities, and individuals"}]}
